text: Ndi pamene tidachita pangano ndi inu Ife tidakweza phiri kukhala pamwamba panu ndi kunena kuti: “Sungani zonse zimene takupatsani ndipo muzimvera”. Iwo adati: “Tamva koma sitimvera”. Chifukwa cha kusakhulupirira kwawo, kupembedza ng’ombe kudakhazikika m’mitima yawo. Nena: “Choipa ndi chimene chikhulupiriro chanu chili kukukakamizani ngati inu ndinu okhulupirira.”
